resource.name: User Invite Default
resource.description: Email sent to invite new users to your DreamFactory instance.
resource.subject: Invitation
resource.body_html:
Hi {first_name},
You have been invited to {df.name}. Go to the following url, enter the code below, and set your password to confirm your account.

{df.confirm_invite_url}?code={confirm_code}

Confirmation Code: {confirm_code}

Thanks,
{from_name}

resource.name: User Registration Default
resource.description: Email sent to new users to complete registration.
resource.subject: Registration Confirmation
resource.body_html:
Hi {first_name},
You have registered as a {df.name} user. Go to the following url, enter the code below, and set your password to confirm your account.

{df.confirm_register_url}?code={confirm_code}

Confirmation Code: {confirm_code}

Thanks,
{from_name}

resource.name: Password Reset Default
resource.description: Email sent to users following a request to reset their password.
resource.subject: Password Reset
resource.body_html:
Hi {first_name},

You have requested to reset your password. Go to the following url, enter the code below, and set your new password.

{df.confirm_reset_url}?code={confirm_code}

Confirmation Code: {confirm_code}

Thanks,
{from_name}
